Acceptable laboratory value indicate adequate baseline organ function screen visit . 7 . Willing stop use herbal natural health product 2 week prior study include : Grapefruit , grapefruit juice , St. John 's Wort . 8 . Willingness abstain alcohol use 3 day prior study . 9 . Female subject either childbearing potential , defined postmenopausal least 1 year surgically sterile ( bilateral tubal ligation , bilateral oophorectomy hysterectomy ) , childbearing potential practice one follow method birth control : Condoms , sponge , foam , jelly , diaphragm intrauterine device ( IUD ) A vasectomized partner Total abstinence sexual intercourse 1 .
